Events that occurred on 28 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1914 - Robert Gilson is the first of the T.C.B.S. to join the War effort. He enlists with the Cambridgeshire Battalion as a second lieutenant.
1930 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1962 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 242.
1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to George Sayer.
1964 - The eighth episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
1978 - Actor Andr√© Morell dies.
2003 - The Hobbit (2003 video game) is released in Europe.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
